contest-event.event-date:
May 9, 1970 D Grand Shield British Open Spring Festival (Grand Shield) 10 Test Piece Contest British Open Spring Festival grand-shield Winners back to 1952 are as engraved on the current Grand Shield trophy. Except for 1981 to 1984 where the bands on the trophy appear to have come second, not first! Was a different trophy given to the winners? If you know the answer please let us know.

There are also results on the trophy from 1902 to 1938, but they are for the Crystal Palace Contest (see link at top of page). Norwegian Artists' Carnival Belle Vue (Kings Hall), Manchester, Greater Manchester, England, UK May 1, 2010, 5:03 p.m. Aug. 20, 2011, 9:30 p.m. 1 Desford Colliery Band Bernard Springett 2 Langley Band Dennis Masters 3 Vernon Building Society (Poynton) Brass Band G. T. Shawcross 4 Rockingham Band Edmund Hoole 5 Dove Holes Band H. Hill 6 Lockwood Band (Huddersfield) Maurice Wadsworth 7 Crookhall Colliery George Holden 8 Slaithwaite Band Derek Broadbent 9 Stalybridge Old Band Les Hine 10 Stretford Band E. R. Harris 11 Walkden Band E. Vint 12 Yorkley Onward Band Graham Watkins
